DOC.brief_summary: To establish a solid foundation, e.g. network and a coordinating centre for testing new SCI therapies in forthcoming randomized controlled multi-centre clinical trials following international standards and guidelines
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-Centre Clinical Study in Chronic Spinal Cord Injury Patients
